title: Bradford confirm Ryan McGowan, Stephen Warnock, Matty Lund triple signing
description: Bradford have confirmed the triple signing of Ryan McGowan, Stephen Warnock and Matty Lund.
content: McGowan has signed an 18-month deal with the League One club, arriving on a free transfer from UAE side Al-Sharjah.The Australian international, who won the Scottish Cup with Hearts in 2012, is set to add reinforcement to the Bantams' defence.Veteran full-back Warnock arrives on loan from Burton Albion until the end of the season, joined by midfielder Lund on a similar deal.Former Liverpool player Warnock rejoins the club who he featured for 12 times during a loan spell early in his career in 2002.The three newcomers arrive off the back of Bradford's recent signing of German striker Kai Bruenker from SC Freiburg on Thursday.Bradford currently find themselves in fifth place in League One.
